name: Red 3 (V)
Lore: 'Biggs Darklighter''s fighter at Battle of Yavin. Part of Ecliptic Evaders squadron near Sullust until transferred to Yavin Base.',
Text: 'May add Biggs as pilot.  If Red 3 is about to be lost before the damage segment, it is instead ''hit.''  If targeted by Darklighter Spin, it is a Used Interrupt.  Immune to Lateral Damage and attrition < 4.',
